news.title: Les filles réussissent mieux à l'école dans 70% des pays
news.summary: Des psychologues britanniques et américains ont passé à la loupe les performances scolaires de 1,5 million de jeunes gens et jeunes femmes de 15 ans. Dans sept pays sur dix, les filles réussissent mieux à l'école que les garçons.

news.title: Girls Outperform Boys Academically Worldwide, Even In Math And Science
news.summary: A new study by the Universities of Missouri and Glasgow proves that girls do better academically than boys in 70 percent of countries worldwide, even in subjects related to mathematics and science.

news.summary: Finally, it seems we have scientific proof that girls are better than boys, because according to new research girls outperform boys in educational achievement regardless of the level of gender, political, economic or social equality.

blogs.title: La mujer es mejor estudiante que el hombre en la mayor parte del mundo
blogs.summary: El hecho de que, tradicionalmente, y aún hoy en muchos países, el hombre haya ostentado puestos más elevados de poder que la mujer, incluyendo los del sector académico, ha llevado a creer que aventaja a esta en cuanto a rendimie

blogs.title: Where are children getting the best education?
blogs.summary: Many of the world’s leading economies can do more to help struggling teenagers to get a better level of education that will equip them for later life. A new report from the Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD), looking at why

author.name: Forum:Blog
author.description: The official blog of the World Economic Forum, better known for the Annual Meeting in Davos, Switzerland.

weibo.summary: 【女孩真的数理化差？】你也许也认为女孩在数学、物理、科学这些领域表现不如男孩。国际大样本数据（包括中国台北）显示，70%的国家女孩的学业成就高于男孩，包括数学、科学和阅读。仅在包括哥伦比亚等三个地区男孩的表现好于女孩。英国和美国，男孩和女孩学业表现相当。http://t.cn/RZnmMd8

author.name: 安人心智
author.description: 安人心智，中国大脑，领先同侪。安人心智是国内领先的脑科学专业公司，伴随人类大脑计划成长，使命是测量与提升人类脑认知能力。官方微博，精选一手脑科学资讯，关爱大脑，提升心智，帮助你更好了解大脑。

weibo.summary: 【数理化真是女生的短板吗？】在你的印象中，相比男生来说，数理化往往是女生的弱势学科？但这个时代好像并非如此了。据国际大样本数据（包括中国台北）显示，70%国家的女孩在数学、科学与阅读方面，学业成就高于男孩。英美这对好哥们，男女学生学业表现则旗鼓相当。研究详情：http://t.cn/RZnmMd8

wikipedia.title: Sex differences in education
wikipedia.summary: Sex differences in education are a type of sex discrimination in the education system affecting both men and women during and after their educational experiences.Pearson, Jennifer.
